name: HardBall 99
description:
Back of Jewel Case - PlayStation (US) (from Ad Blurbs)

AS REAL AS IT GETS

The All-Time Best Simulation of Baseball

ALL NEW 3D GAMEPLAY featuring motion captured polygonal players and sizzling on-the-field action.

FULLY LICENSED with Major League Baseball™, and MLBPA™ giving you all of the 1998 teams and players.

CUSTOM LEAGUE & SCHEDULE GENERATOR sets the number of games played and division alignments.

EXTENSIVE STAT TRACKING in over 100 categories for single game, full season, and entire careers.

DEEPEST SIMULATION featuring minor league system, free-agents, active and disabled lists.

ALL 30 MAJOR LEAGUE STADIUMS including Arizona and Tampa Bay.
